description: Strengthening Capacity in Policy Formulation, Monitoring and Evaluation for Poverty Eradication

subproject.description: Utilizing available datasets collected by the Government of Malaysia, this project aims to assist and strengthen the capacity of the Economic Planning Unit in the Prime Minister’s Department of Malaysia (i) to better monitor trends and patterns in poverty by defining a new poverty threshold, and (ii) to improve poverty policy formulation by broadening the range and details of poverty measures in the National Development Plans.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SEDC: Poverty Eradication

title: SEDC: Poverty Formulation, Monitoring & Eval
